install.name: Countdown Module
install.author: OSTraining.com
install.copyright: Copyright (C) 2005 - 2008 Open Source Matters. All rights reserved.
install.description: The module displays a countdown to an event of your choice. Now developed by http://OSTraining.com, it was originally developed by Beliyadm from http://blog.pbelkov.com

param.name: ev_tit
param.label: Event Title
param.description: Enter a title for your event

param.name: ev_ddate
param.label: Display Event Date
param.description: Display the date of the Event

param.name: ev_ddleft
param.label: Time to event
param.description: Do you want to display the word (Days away to event)

param.name: ev_dhour
param.label: Hours/Minutes?
param.description: Do you want to display the words (Hours and minutes to event)

param.name: ev_js
param.label: JS effect
param.description: Show countdown in real time (per second)

param.name: ev_dlink
param.label: Show link on the description of the event?

param.name: ev_endtime
param.label: Time has come
param.description: Text to display whencountdown is reached

param.name: ev_ltitle
param.label: Text URL
param.description: Text to display instead of URL

param.name: ev_l
param.label: URL
param.description: URL links to the description of the event (in the format http:// ...)

param.name: loadcss
param.label: Load Module CSS?
param.description: Yes or no - if not, then the contents of the file modules / mod_countdown / tmpl / style.css introduce a CSS template or allow Joomla template to handle css
